version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: - The view is now scalable instead of being fixed to 500px

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: - Added Paused and Record Paused states

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Fix Windows compatibility Only draw text if hints are shown Place hint window at 0,0 before showing it Fix waiting popup to overwrite action Properly escape display names in code generation (replaces " with ')

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Add confirmation to remove sequence Change 'Key / chord' to 'Shortcut' to avoid confusion Add a way to change font / use default font

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Reorder actions Edit display name Option to keep sequence open after action Button to remove sequence shortcut Fix some special characters issues, add others Press Enter to validate new sequence / action edit Change 'Key / chord' to 'Key(s)' in popup to avoid confusion

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Fix sequences getting corrupted Internal: Add sequence versioning Internal: Rely on 'metadata' instead of parsing lua code

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Fix "keep open" for scripts that take focus

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Fix nested sequences

version.name: 2.0beta1
version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Retina Support Style Editor (with preview) Text/Separator entries Hints are clickable Hints flash when clicked or shortcut is pressed Screen border detection Fixed bug with naming duplicate sequences Fixed changing action keeping previous action name as display text

version.name: 2.0beta2
version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Sort sequences list alphabetically

version.name: 2.0beta3
version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Drag and drop to reorder actions Add option to close on unmatched key Hide actions (ie they won't show up in hints) Report unknown commands Fix multimonitor on Win (thanks nofish!) Account for text/header width in layout calculation Close hints before executing command (allows e.g 'under mouse cursor' actions) Fix bug with " key Discard display name if reassigning an action to an unknown command

version.name: 2.0beta4
version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Remember previously focused window and give its focus back before executing a command

version.name: 2.0beta5
version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Update to ReaImGui 0.8.1 Add "Export summary to CSV"

version.name: 2.0beta6
version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Try to fix unicode issues

version.name: 2.0beta7
version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Correctly escape '\'

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Fix crash when closing action window when prompted to select an action Fix MIDI Event List not working

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Shift + character in [A-Z] range show up as capital letters

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Upgrade to ReaImGui 0.9 Use ReaImGui shims to stay compatible through future ReaImGui releases

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Added menu mode

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Added checkmark for current size in menu Script now exit early if no option is selected from the menu Code cleanup

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Fixed bug where 2048 wouldn't show in the menu if selected

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Automatically set "Request block size" Added block size 32 to menu

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Automatically set "Request block size" on Windows Better menu layout and prompt

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Added action for 16, 32 and 4096 Added 4096 to menu

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Fix last update

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Fix WASAPI and WDL Kernel Streaming with REAPER 7 Added "Double" and "Halve" block size Code cleanup

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Handle preferences window title localization (ie make the script work with non-default langpacks) Fix for REAPER < 6.82

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Added "Set limits for 'double/halve block (buffer) size'" action Browse ReaPack for js_ReaScriptAPI if it's not installed

version.author: Souk21
version.changelog: Replaced "" with '' in 'Set limits...' for Windows compatibilty
